    | timestamp = 01:18:46.180
    | text      = It's all documented in my films, prisonplanet.com.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:48.260
    | text      = God bless you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:49.260
    | text      = See you live next Sunday and back tomorrow live.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:51.739
    | text      = So that's how he ends the show.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:54.380
    | text      = With 9-11 was an inside job?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:56.020
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:57.020
    | text      = That's a great way to end a show.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:18:58.020
    | text      = It's all documented in my films, blah, blah, blah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:00.300
    | text      = But it's not...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:01.300
    | text      = Also, it was the Saudis.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:04.500
    | text      = Right, but his films are also not accurate.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:07.420
    | text      = What?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:08.420
    | text      = So the two things that I want to say is, first, that mentality of all governments are bad
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:14.340
    | text      = is really, I think, what more is motivating Alex.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:17.680
    | text      = All the militia stuff and everything, he's really an anti-government guy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:22.100
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:23.100
    | text      = And it's weird that now he's pro-Trumpian government.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:26.720
    | text      = But be that as it may, I think that that really sums him up in terms of his politics.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:30.939
    | text      = He's not a libertarian or anything like that, except in as much as that libertarians want
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:35.220
    | text      = almost no government.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:38.180
    | text      = But...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:39.180
    | text      = Highest authority in the land is the local sheriff, Dan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:42.180
    | text      = Absolutely.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:43.180
    | text      = That's just a true fact.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:44.180
    | text      = So he's talking about Al-Qaeda being used to start things off in Serbia.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:50.739
    | text      = And it just so happens that I have recently been reading this book.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:55.359
    | text      = It's called The Trigger, Hunting the Assassin Who Brought the World to War.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:19:58.920
    | text      = It's about the guy named Gavrilo Princip.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:01.420
    | text      = Who killed Prince...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:03.420
    | text      = Franz Ferdinand.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:04.420
    | text      = Yeah, Franz Ferdinand.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:05.420
    | text      = To start World War I.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:06.420
    | text      = Yeah, that dude.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:07.420
    | text      = That fucking dick.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:09.100
    | text      = The reality is, in the 90s, there was an Islamic faction from out of the country called... There
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:16.060
    | text      = was a Mujahideen in Bosnia.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:20.020
    | text      = But the way Alex is presenting this is really fucked up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:22.939
    | text      = I'm just going to read to you a passage here from this book that I read recently.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:26.579
    | text      = I'm like, oh wow, this is very relevant.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:29.180
    | text      = The Mujah from Bosnia were highly secretive during the war, but while I was researching
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:32.920
    | text      = this book, I made a breakthrough by tracking down one of the foreign Muslim fighters.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:36.840
    | text      = It turned out that he grew up a few miles from my hometown.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:39.380
    | text      = Shaheed Butt was just two years older than me, born in Birmingham to parents originally
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:43.800
    | text      = from Pakistan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:45.380
    | text      = Working as a reporter, I had first seen him in a Yemeni court in 1999 after he had been
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:49.260
    | text      = arrested and charged with terrorist activities committed in Aden, his Brummie accent being
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:54.899
    | text      = memorably out of place in the far edge of Arabia.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:20:58.779
    | text      = It would be more than a decade before I was able to sit down and talk to him about Bosnia
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:21:02.260
    | text      = at a cake shop serving Arabic tea and pastries in a Birmingham suburb with a particularly
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:21:07.479
    | text      = strong Islamic community.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:21:10.060
    | text      = The thing you have to remember is that when I was growing up in Britain in the 1970s,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:21:13.180
    | text      = we had a difficult sense of our nationality, he said.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:21:16.399
    | text      = This was a time when the streets around my home would have walls painted with APL and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:21:20.060
    | text      = huge letters that stood for Anti-Paki League, and all through my teenage years, people like
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:21:25.359
    | text      = me were being abused in the streets, getting beaten up, having dogs set on us, that sort
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:21:29.640
    | text      = of thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:21:30.640
    | text      = Back then, just leaving your front door could get you in trouble.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:21:33.739
    | text      = When I left school, all I wanted to do was serve as a soldier.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:21:36.500
    | text      = I wanted to be a Royal Marine, right?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:21:38.220
    | text      = It was the time of the Falklands War, and the Royal Marines were the best of the best,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:21:41.939
    | text      = all over the telly and in the papers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:21:43.880
    | text      = So I went to a recruitment office and asked to join the Royal Marines.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:21:46.859
    | text      = You know what they told me?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:21:47.859
    | text      = They said, we cannot have you because you're a fat Paki.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:21:51.140
    | text      = So do you know what I did for the next year?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:21:52.920
    | text      = I ran around the streets near my home in boots with a rucksack full of bricks, and I went
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:21:56.859
    | text      = back to the recruitment office 12 months later and asked to join the Royal Marines again.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:01.159
    | text      = This time, you know what they said?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:02.340
    | text      = Well, you're not a fat Paki anymore, but you're still a Paki.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:05.979
    | text      = In the early 90s, he started to attend mosques where some of the first radical clerics were
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:09.619
    | text      = beginning to preach.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:10.619
    | text      = It was around this time when the war in Bosnia began, and he watched video cassettes showing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:14.420
    | text      = Bosnian Muslim victims of the war.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:16.619
    | text      = Quote, it's very confusing to begin with, to see these Muslims with blue eyes and blond
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:20.779
    | text      = hair.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:21.779
    | text      = It was not like anything I had seen before, but it was very traumatic, overwhelming, you
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:24.819
    | text      = know, just to learn that people were suffering like this just because they were Muslims.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:29.300
    | text      = He joined an aid convoy arranged through his local mosque that sent out two coaches from
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:33.060
    | text      = Britain full of supplies intended for Bosnia, with the plan of bringing back refugees.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:38.180
    | text      = It ended in chaos as the vehicle got no further than Zagreb in Croatia and was unable to cross
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:42.859
    | text      = the border into the war zone.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:44.340
    | text      = Quote, there were these guys who were meant to have organized this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:47.500
    | text      = I said to them, you said you were going to do one thing and you end up doing another.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:51.779
    | text      = We fell out.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:52.779
    | text      = It was useless.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:53.779
    | text      = So after some prayer, I joined up with a guy from London who had a van full of supplies,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:57.239
    | text      = and we managed to drive into Bosnia.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:59.180
    | text      = I had never been out of Birmingham, and there I was all of a sudden in a war zone.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:03.260
    | text      = We gave out the food.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:04.260
    | text      = There were lines and lines of people, and they took it all, and that's where it came
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:07.779
    | text      = into my head.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:09.060
    | text      = The media likes to say a Muslim like me only fights because we're some kind of crazed psychotic,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:13.699
    | text      = but it was not like that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:14.939
    | text      = I went to Bosnia to bring humanitarian help, and after the aid ran out, what other humanitarian
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:20.500
    | text      = help could I give apart from protecting them?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:23.020
    | text      = These people could not protect themselves, and that's how I could help.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:25.779
    | text      = I would fight.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:27.180
    | text      = My mate with the van went crazy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:29.140
    | text      = It's not like it is in the films, he said.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:30.800
    | text      = Are you for real?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:31.800
    | text      = How are you going to fight?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:32.800
    | text      = You don't know anyone here, and you don't have any weapons.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:34.760
    | text      = He went on and on trying to talk me out of it, but I had made up my mind.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:37.939
    | text      = I wrote a letter to my wife, which he took with him, and then he was off in his van,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:42.180
    | text      = and I sat there, six o'clock in the morning, the sun still rising, next to the road in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:45.939
    | text      = a town called Travnik.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:47.640
    | text      = So he gets picked up by a guy at the side of the road, and he ends up joining the mujahideen
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:51.819
    | text      = forces, and so he mostly is training and training, but on a few occasions, they were real fighting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:58.699
    | text      = I don't want to say I was a hero or anything, but the times I took part in attacks, which
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:02.619
    | text      = were really heavy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:03.619
    | text      = Yeah, guys on either side of me getting hit, that sort of thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:06.899
    | text      = I saw myself as a traditional mujahideen.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:09.079
    | text      = I was a fighter, sure, but I was fighting to help the oppressed, to protect them against
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:12.840
    | text      = an aggressor.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:13.840
    | text      = It was a noble act, and one that I would do again.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:16.539
    | text      = But these guys who take part in suicide attacks, they're not true mujahideen.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:19.939
    | text      = They're killing innocent people, and for me, that makes no sense at all, from any point
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:23.060
    | text      = of view.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:24.060
    | text      = It makes no sense from a religious point of view, as it's not part of my religion, and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:27.699
    | text      = it makes no sense from a military point of view, a strategic perspective.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:31.220
    | text      = How are you going to win the hearts and minds of people if you kill people who are not involved?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:35.939
    | text      = Bosnia's role in the evolution of modern jihad has largely been overlooked, but in Shaheed,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:40.460
    | text      = I had found an example of what can happen when the anger of young people is ignored.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:45.380
    | text      = Western politicians who stood by when the worst atrocities of the Bosnian war took place,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:49.380
    | text      = ethnic cleansing, death camps, genocide, inadvertently provided Islamic militants with a rallying
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:54.500
    | text      = cry they would later use to justify acts of terrorism.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:58.020
    | text      = Yeah, that sounds right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:00.140
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:01.140
    | text      = There's another passage, a really short one, that I think really sums up some stuff that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:06.899
    | text      = I just want to grab here real quick.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:11.220
    | text      = This is a quote from another guy that he was traveling with, the author here, Tim Butcher.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:17.619
    | text      = He was traveling with an interpreter, and he's describing what they ended up experiencing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:23.140
    | text      = because he lived through the war in the 90s, and he was a Serbian Muslim who were, largely
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:30.380
    | text      = speaking...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:31.380
    | text      = I know there's a lot of ins and outs and difficulties in terms of the Croats and the Muslims.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:36.819
    | text      = There's a lot of complication in terms of what caused the worst parts of the Bosnian
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:43.060
    | text      = war in the 90s.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:44.060
    | text      = Spoiler alert, it was Slobodan Milosevic.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:47.180
    | text      = But this guy was a Bosnian Muslim in those times, and this quote really stuck with me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:54.220
    | text      = And then all this shit comes along in the 90s.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:56.300
    | text      = Suddenly it matters if you're a Muslim or a Croat.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:58.859
    | text      = That stuff had been parked for years, for decades.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:01.079
    | text      = Those people who said, these people have always hated each other were just being lazy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:06.000
    | text      = In my own life, I saw people from different communities work together, live together,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:09.579
    | text      = get married even.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:10.579
    | text      = There was nothing inevitable about what happened in the 90s.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:13.579
    | text      = It was just that a few, the extremists, the elite, the greedy, saw nationalism as a way
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:18.539
    | text      = to grab what they wanted.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:20.460
    | text      = Ha.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:21.460
    | text      = Ha.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:22.460
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:23.460
    | text      = Ha.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:24.460
    | text      = Ha.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:25.460
    | text      = That's such the same story that you hear from, like, yeah, if you want to go to Germany in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:32.699
    | text      = 1937, you go back and you hear those stories of like, we lived perfectly well next to all
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:39.260
    | text      = of our Jewish neighbors, and then one day it was like, no Jews allowed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:44.100
    | text      = And so many people just will go along with it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:46.939
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:47.939
    | text      = Like the hatred and...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:48.939
    | text      = Scapegoating in the name of nationalism.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
